Bink SDK 1.7b

Distributing Bink on the Sony PS2

Discussion

To distribute an application that uses Bink, you don't have to include anything other than your ELF and the Bink movies that you want to play. Bink is supplied as a static library that is linked directly into your application, so nothing else is required (even the internal IOP IRX that we use is built right into the static lib).
